MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH7 postcode area of Pontybodkin, affecting properties in Corwen Road, Ffordd Y Bont, Victoria Crescent and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00AM due to safety issue. Our team will be carrying out work safely near the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12 Midday. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:22AM on 5th March 2021
